merged_caption: A wide shot frames the scene from an isometric perspective, presenting a retro arcade game with a distinct pixel-art aesthetic. The main subject, a small triangular aircraft with an orange body, yellow wings, and pink tail fins, starts in the bottom left and moves forward through a dark blue, maze-like area that occupies the center of the frame. The maze is bordered by a tall wall on the top left and a shorter wall on the bottom left, with various obstacles such as red-and-white striped barrels, gray pipe-like obstacles, and small dark craters scattered throughout. The floor is marked with a grid of lighter blue lines forming a labyrinthine path. The user interface elements are fixed around the gameplay area: scores are at the top left, an altitude meter labeled "H" and "L" is on the left, a fuel gauge is at the bottom center, and an enemy counter is in the bottom right. The aircraft then moves towards a long gray brick wall, firing at it until a section flashes and disappears, continuing to maneuver through the corridors and destroying gray ground-based targets. Bright yellow and red explosions erupt on the floor at times. The camera smoothly tracks the aircraft throughout the video, moving up and to the right as the plane navigates the level. The scene includes a heads-up display with several overlays, such as a "TOP" score and a "1UP" score at the top, "FUEL" gauge and aircraft icons on the bottom left, "ENEMY PLANE = 00" on the bottom right, and "© SEGA 1982" at the bottom center.

4. Spatial: Describes the spatial relationships and framing
5. Camera: Describes camera movements and framing choices

{captions}

4. Eliminate ALL redundant information - if the same detail appears in multiple captions, mention it only ONCE

6. When describing temporal changes, integrate motion and camera movements in chronological order to show how the scene evolves
7. CRITICAL: Every unique detail from all five captions must appear in the final merged caption - nothing should be omitted
8. Do NOT add any information not present in the original captions
9. Return only the merged caption without any additional text or formatting
